templates.name: Initial Outreach - Broker
templates.subject: Interest in {DEAL_NAME} Opportunity

templates.name: Initial Outreach - Direct to Seller
templates.subject: Acquisition Interest in {COMPANY_NAME}
templates.body:
Dear {SELLER_NAME},

I am reaching out on behalf of {BUYER_COMPANY}, a [describe buyer] with a strong track record of acquiring and growing businesses in the {INDUSTRY} sector.

We have been following {SELLER_COMPANY} and are impressed by what you have built. We believe there could be a strong strategic fit between our organizations.

We would welcome the opportunity to explore a potential acquisition that would:
- Provide liquidity for you and your shareholders
- Ensure continuity for your employees and customers
- Position the business for continued growth

Would you be open to a confidential conversation to explore this opportunity? I am happy to sign an NDA and would ensure complete discretion throughout any discussions.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Sincerely,
{USER_NAME}
{USER_TITLE}
{BUYER_COMPANY}

templates.name: NDA Request
templates.subject: NDA for {DEAL_NAME} - {COMPANY_NAME}
templates.body:
Dear {RECIPIENT_NAME},

Thank you for the information on {DEAL_NAME}. We are very interested in learning more about this opportunity.

To proceed with our evaluation, we would like to execute a Non-Disclosure Agreement. I have attached our standard mutual NDA for your review.

Key terms:
- Mutual confidentiality obligations
- 2-year term
- Standard exceptions for publicly available information
- Governed by {STATE} law

Please review and let me know if you have any questions or would like to propose any modifications. Once we have an executed NDA in place, we would appreciate receiving the Confidential Information Memorandum and financial information.

Best regards,
{USER_NAME}

templates.name: NDA Follow-up
templates.subject: Following up: NDA for {DEAL_NAME}
templates.body:
Dear {RECIPIENT_NAME},

I wanted to follow up on the NDA I sent last week for {DEAL_NAME}. We remain very interested in this opportunity and are eager to move forward with our evaluation.

Have you had a chance to review the NDA? If you have any questions or concerns about any of the terms, I would be happy to discuss them with you.

We are prepared to move quickly once we receive the additional information.

Please let me know the status at your earliest convenience.

Thank you,
{USER_NAME}

templates.name: Due Diligence Kickoff
templates.subject: Due Diligence Process - {DEAL_NAME}
templates.body:
Dear {SELLER_NAME},

Thank you for accepting our LOI for {DEAL_NAME}. We are excited to move forward with the due diligence process.

To facilitate an efficient process, I wanted to outline our approach:

1. Data Room Access: Please provide access to your virtual data room or let us know if you would prefer us to set one up.

2. Initial Document Request: I have attached our initial due diligence request list. We understand that some items may not be applicable or readily available, and we can discuss priorities.

3. Management Meetings: We would like to schedule meetings with key management team members. Please let us know availability over the next two weeks.

4. Site Visits: We would like to visit your main facilities. Please suggest some potential dates.

5. Professional Advisors: We will be engaging [QoE firm] for a Quality of Earnings analysis and [Law firm] for legal due diligence.

Our goal is to complete due diligence within [30-45] days. We will keep you updated on our progress and any additional information needs.

Please let me know if you have any questions about the process.

Best regards,
{USER_NAME}

templates.name: Revised Offer
templates.subject: Revised Proposal - {DEAL_NAME}
templates.body:
Dear {SELLER_NAME},

Thank you for the feedback on our initial proposal for {DEAL_NAME}. After careful consideration of your comments and further analysis, we are pleased to submit a revised offer.

Revised terms:
- Purchase Price: ${REVISED_PRICE} (increased from ${ORIGINAL_PRICE})
- {OTHER_REVISION_1}
- {OTHER_REVISION_2}

These revisions reflect:
- Our continued strong interest in the business
- The value we see in {SPECIFIC_VALUE_DRIVER}
- Our desire to reach a mutually beneficial agreement

All other terms from our original LOI remain the same. We believe this revised proposal addresses your key concerns while allowing us to move forward with confidence.

Please review and let us know your thoughts. We remain committed to completing this transaction and look forward to your response.

Best regards,
{USER_NAME}

templates.name: Closing Coordination
templates.subject: Closing Logistics - {DEAL_NAME} - {CLOSING_DATE}
templates.body:
Team,

As we approach the closing date for {DEAL_NAME}, I wanted to coordinate the final logistics.

Closing Date: {CLOSING_DATE}
Time: {CLOSING_TIME}
Location: {CLOSING_LOCATION}

Pre-closing items (to be completed by {DATE}):
- Final purchase agreement execution
- Financing documents finalized
- Wire transfer instructions confirmed
- Escrow agent coordination
- Third-party consents obtained

Closing day agenda:
1. Final document review (9:00 AM)
2. Execution of documents (10:00 AM)
3. Wire transfer confirmation (11:00 AM)
4. Closing confirmation (12:00 PM)

Post-closing items:
- Employee announcements
- Customer notifications
- Press release (if applicable)
- Integration kickoff meeting

Please confirm your availability and let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,
{USER_NAME}
